content.detailedDescription: Working delivery notice something like fire in the sky maybe a meteor. but no it was moving slower and slower than two smaller firey object seem to fall off and drop to earth. had to wake up from looking at it i was stopped on roadway and began recording. larger fire moved across sky and got smaller intill it looked as a star and my next blink it was gone.
content.summary: fire in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Working delivery notice something like fire in the sky maybe a meteor. but no it was moving slower and slower than two smaller firey object seem to fall off and drop to earth. had to wake up from looking at it i was stopped on roadway and began recording. larger fire moved across sky and got smaller intill it looked as a star and my next blink it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: June 7 2012, i was taking my dog out to use the restroom at 11:20pm, im into astronomy heavily, so i always star gaze. when i looked up, the object appeared to resemble venus, which is no longer in the sky. i kept looking at it for about 1-2 minutes wondering what it was. then it just started moving on its own, the light was extremely bright, then dimmed out all of the sudden, you could still clearly see it, just not as well. for example if at its brightest it was a 10, it dimmed to around a 3. then it came back to a 10 and stopped moving for about 1 mintue. then it started to move again, for about another 5 minutes it didnt dim, just moved in a directional path. the object then went back to a 3 while moving for about another 5 minutes and stopped. again it came back to a 10, started moving again and disappeared behind a tree line. it was close to about 40 mins of activity before i couldnt see it anymore.
content.summary: Bright light appeared as star with hovering and fast movement.

content.detailedDescription: It just stayed in one spot for 2 hours. lost sight of it as the clouds rolled in.
content.summary: Pulsating ufo or star

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my front porch and was looking northwards in the sky and saw a commercial airplane with ensuing vapor trail heading westward and almost simutaneously noticed another object heading eastward that did not resemble anything i've ever seen before. flagstaff az is roughly 50 miles north of my location and was in the general direction i was looking when i witnessed this. to put into perspective, i was looking at something far enough away as to get any detailed visual confirmation but close enough to make out a definite visual confirmation of the airplanes fuselage and the outline of the tail section. when i first noticed the unidentified object, it seemed to be stationary then started to move what looked like from my perspective, toward the commercial airplane. whatever i was looking at was disc or cigar shaped with a very bright metallic like glare coming off of it and looked larger than the airplane. i wanted to grab a camera and get a picture of this but at the same time, i didn't want to miss anything seeing that the object, and the airplane, seemed to be very very close to each other in proximity. what happened next is the part that turned my stomach.......It vanished right before my eyes. the hair on the back of my neck and arms seemed to be standing at full attention. all i kept muttering to myself was omg...Omg...Did i see what i really think i saw? did anyone else see what i just saw? i am a sky gazer during the night and day.I hope to get pic's and or video if the opportunity ever comes my way again. i've been waiting 20+ yrs to see something along these lines. the day may have finally come!
content.summary: Very bright object that was disc or cigar shaped. just disapeared as it seemed to approach commercial airliner.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend of mine both witnessed this event at wal mart while we were getting ready to enter the store, we witnessed two bright white lights blinking in sequance that they looked as if they may be rotating it had a straight flight path and was moving west east through springfield, mo. we watched the event for about 5 mins. before the lights just shut off as if someone had turned out the lights on a light switch, the objects made no sound as the flew through the air.
content.summary: Two blinking lights sequintually next to each other

content.detailedDescription:
I am a landscape photographer. i normally go out during storms to take pictures when i can distance myself from the storm itself. i had been photographing lightning from a vantage point which overlooks the new hospital being built. 

after spending approximately 30 minutes shooting intervals of time-lapse photography, i suddenly noticed 8 lights in-line with each other, with one additional light hovering over the far left light, within close proximity.  

the lights did not appear to flicker and they defiantly did not move during the 5 minutes i was photographing them.  

it had been previously raining terribly and this was one of the worst storms colorado has seen in 20 years. 

during the time that the pictures were taken, it was dry and hadn't been raining for approximately 1 hour. 

according to the air force operations center, all flights were grounded due to the severe weather and they had nothing showing up on their radar in the area that i was observing the lights - somewhere in between highlands ranch and the denver area. 
 
i did not observe the lights appear but they did appear to fade away after 5 minutes. during the entire 5 minutes the lights appeared nev

i am a professional photographer. i have vast knowledge of celestial movements, natural phenomenon, and aircraft identifications. 

i could not find a reasonable explanation for the presence of these lights.
content.summary: 8 round white lights in-line & 1 extra light above far left light during lightning storm hovering.

content.detailedDescription: My co-worker yelled for me to come outside while she was on her smoke brake. she was yelling that there was a ufo in the sky. i went outside and immediately spotted the ufo. it was flying across the sky very fast, much faster than any plane. it appeared to be hovering and would even move vertical. it changed directions several times and disappeared behind some tress for a moment. it also had blinking lights that were all different colors (violet, pink, green, and blue). then it was suddenly gone and we didn't see it anymore. we have checked the sky in the same place the last few nights and have not seen anything.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I spotted an obect in the sky that was flying very quickly. it hovered, and changed directions. it also had multiple lights blinking from it.

content.detailedDescription: I'm 24 and i live in bonita springs,florida. i saw something in the sky tonight (june 8,2012 around midnight). i was walking our dogs with my mom and we heard a weird noise and saw something in the sky. we thought it was a helicopter at first but the shape proved that innacurate.It was a long cylinder shape and it moved slower than an airplane. the color seemed to blend in with the sky , as if it was almost camouflaged, we could in fact see the outline of the object. it had a red and green light on the front and came right at us and did 4 roundabouts each time coming right at us. its flight path was east then it did a turn and headed south,than west directly toward us, after getting close and going directly over our heads it would turn north, then east, then south and onto west toward us. i felt like it could see my mom and i and was headed right at us. i had no idea what it was and i just stood there frozen. i felt like it knew we were there and was specifically coming round in circles towards my mom and i. it circled and came directly at us a total of 4 times, one right after the other. i had a horrible feeling inside me.I felt afraid but was in such shock and so curious. i thought there had to be a plausible explanation. after all this isn't the first weird flying object i've seen near my house before. after the 4th fly by it went off into the distance heading northwest.  i don't believe in ufo's but i cannot explain what i saw. i never heard of a cylinder shaped ufo so i went inside the house got on the computer and looked up cylinder shaped helicopters. the results i received were cylinder ufo's . upon looking at the images i realized it was exactly what i had seen. i wish my phone wasn't dead inside the house at that time otherwise i would've tried to somehow capture it on camera, but even so i was so frozen and felt so weird that taking pictures wasn't even on my mind at the time.Perhaps its just the government testing new technology.
content.summary: Cylinder/missle shape object circled my mom and i 4 times.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the barn with my daughter, when my son shouted "ufo"!  i thought he was joking.  i looked to the south and saw a steady white light heading  north in our direction.  it was visible between the two trees.  it was not on the path the airplanes from the airport use. there were no blinking lights on it, so i knew it was not an airplane.  as it headed our way i listened for a sound.  there was no sound.  as it went over us, it was silent.  no sound!  it appeared to be traveling very slowly. it turned toward the east when it went over us.  my daughter asked if i could see the ring around it.  i could not, as i did not have my glasses on.  i told her to run and get her camera.  she said it would be gone before she could get back out with it, but i told her it was going too slow.  so she went and got it, but by the time she got back, it had traveled a long way, but was still visible. i wanted to get in my car and follow it, but my daughter said it was going too fast.
after the light was obscured by trees, we talked.  i had strong, strange feeling, that the light (object) was "surveying" - doing surveillance.
i told my daughter to draw a picture of the ring.  she did. a few minutes later she took a picture of some clouds, and there was a round light in the picture.  almost like the moon.  but the moon is not out.
content.summary: Silent light flew over us, and changed direction.  very high,  very slow

I was at the barn with my daughter, when my son shouted "ufo"!  i thought he was joking.  i looked to the south and saw a steady white light heading  north in our direction.  it was visible between the two trees.  it was not on the path the airplanes from the airport use. there were no blinking lights on it, so i knew it was not an airplane.  as it headed our way i listened for a sound.  there was no sound.  as it went over us, it was silent.  no sound!  it appeared to be traveling very slowly. it turned toward the east when it went over us.  my daughter asked if i could see the ring around it.  i could not, as i did not have my glasses on.  i told her to run and get her camera.  she said it would be gone before she could get back out with it, but i told her it was going too slow.  so she went and got it, but by the time she got back, it had traveled a long way, but was still visible. i wanted to get in my car and follow it, but my daughter said it was going too fast.

content.detailedDescription: Taking my dogs outside, looking at stars and for planes as usual, noticed this super bright "star" moving! ran 2 the front of the house and it's there. a bright planet looking star moving horizontally across the sky towards a stationary star. watched it for about a minute. heard a neighbor outside, turned 2 call them down and then it was just gone. there are no trees it could've disappeared behind. my daughter saw it. this was after we saw what could've been another ufo, i am posting that event as well, and am keeping my eyes towards the sky. have a good day.
content.summary: Moving "star" disappeared

content.detailedDescription: We were outside on our front porch when noticed lights approaching at a fast speed. the object began to slow down, then hovered for about three to five seconds. then the object quickly ascended approximately 20-30 feet then quickly descended to the original position. the object again hovered for a few more seconds then quickly moved to the right; faster than any plane i have ever seen. it made another quick right, stopped, hovered, then made a quick descend out of our sight. the lights were a yellowish-orange color that pulsated and changed to red. this has to be the craziest thing i have ever seen and i hope it was a ufo because i have never seen one before! i really wish we could have gotten footage of this object but i didn't have the phone on me and it only lasted one to two minutes total!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Weird lights over salem, oregon

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out on my friends back porch with my girlfriend facing southwest about 11:00 pm on thursday night (6/7) having a brew. the house is on a high ridge line with a great southwestern view.  my friend noticed a bright light approaching and shouted out to "check it out".  i spotted a very, very bright light maybe a few thousand feet in the sky.  it moved in a southwest to northeast direction in the night sky.  i didn't hear any noise from it.  a jet was flying overhead at the time and clearly visible and audible.  the jet was significantly above the light and clearly distinguishable.  the light appeared to be like a  bowling pin standing upright, and about 1/3 from the top, or where the neck on a bowling ball is, an aura type of light emitted horizontally out of its neck.  as it moved across the sky in a generally sw to ne direction, it shifted direction, or zig zagged numerous times and seemed to stay still or float for brief periods (1 sec.) before moving again.  it was very a very bright white light.  it made no sound.  i grabbed my iphone, recorded about 20 sec. but it just shows up black.  whole episode lasted maybe 1-2 minutes.
content.summary: Very bright light went overhead 1000+ feet. bowling pin shape with light coming out horizontally from top 1/3 of pin light.  airplane visible at time.  light zig zag randomly while on path

content.detailedDescription:
Our family decided to have a little camp out in the backyard. i was sitting in a chair looking at the stars while my kids were suppoused to be going to sleep. i saw the 1st light moving from the south to the north (east of my house) about that time my 2 kids that were still awake came out of their tent to "go to the bathroom" i got excited because i wanted them to see what i have been watching in our night sky recently. they were quite amazed as i pointed out the difference between these objects and the planes that were periodicly flying over. the first was spotted around 10:20 we watched it travel across most of the sky before it faded. almost as soon as 1st was gone we spotted a 2nd directly over head traveling from the west to east. this one also covered most of the sky within prob 2 min before it vanished. i checked the time when it was gone, 10:25.
10:34 a bright "star" appeared visible just over the corner of our house, between the tops of the trees across the street. (not actual near us just visible in that area) the object did not come from behind the trees, it just showed up in that area then traveled east, then view was blocked by trees. i saw a fourth again directly over head traveling from nw to se. first noticed near big dipper handle. as it passed what i think is a star or planet "very bright" east of our home at the time of sighting, it seems to me that it had made a slight of ark to its path and was now heading in a more east direction. lost sight of it just before my roof or nearby trees could block view. time when we lost sight of it 10:38. i wish i could have gotten better details but i was very excited to have my kids see the strange lights. also, looked at them with cheap binoculars. no visible air craft lights.
content.summary: Flying stars

content.detailedDescription: I was at work & stepped out to take a smoke break. i've been interested in planet location so i looked directly up to locate mars & saturn when i immediately noticed a very bright light. i'm familiar a bit with the position of bright stars & this one wasn't right. i was alone but still out loud i said "what in the world is that"? i focused on a nearby star to make sure my eyes weren't playing tricks on me, to verify that the "object" was moving. i could see that it was moving just like a satellite would in orbit but it was far brighter. i watched it until it went out of view due to a neighboring single story building. i've seen satellites  move & i've never seen one stay as bright for so long as this did. i was so curious about the object that when i left work at 11:pm i came home & went to the tracker site for the iss to see if that's what it was but based on it's path over the east coast it didn't seem to fit. i've never seen anything unexplainable in the sky but was strange.
content.summary: Bright venus type light moving s.E directly overhead. large view area. contiued same path till no longer visable.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were standing on our back deck smoking a cigarette at very close to 10:30 p.M. being such a clear night, i was observing the stars, as i often do, when i noticed a star that was more of an orange color that was steadily moving east in a straight line.  i pointed it out to my husband, and while i was trying to get him to lock eyes on it - as it was moving faily swiftly - he noticed a different "star" doing the same thing.  at first, i didn't notice the second one moving, and i passed it off as just a bright planet, and continued to get my husband to see the first moving light.  about the time that he finally saw what i was looking at, i noticed the "planet-like" light was also moving, only in a ne direction.  both appeared to be traveling at the exact same speed, and both were solid, unblinking lights.  there was absolutely no sound, and both moved across the sky, out of our sight within no more than a minute and a half.  both appeared to be far above our atmosphere, possibly orbiting earth, or just passing by.
content.summary: Solid lights, one star-like & one planet-like, over lenexa

content.detailedDescription:
My friends and i were outside on my balcony smoking a cigarette when we noticed an airplane in the sky. this is common because i live in a flight path leading up to the main airport in state college. this time we took notice to a bright "star", that was an orb, that looked brighter than sirius, hovering and flying around in what looked like a small circle. soon, there was another orb that was directly underneath it. they continued for approximately 30 seconds until they shot up out of no where and started to follow the plane. the further away they got, the more they flashed orange and green. 

a few minutes afterwards, we were looking up into the sky eager to see something else. as i was turning to go inside i realized another bright star. my eyes hadn't even completely focused on the star before it developed a bright fire ring around it, flew upwards, than shot to the left and flew out of sight.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 2 white orbs hovering possibly 3 as well as another comet like ufo

content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other,Unknown
content.summary: Worm like serpentv

content.detailedDescription: Estaba caminando cuando vi algo grande moverse en el aire... volteo a ver y veo algo con varios picos.. parecia una pi���ata de color rosa bajando en curva lentamente.. saco mi celular y tomo una fotografia. se veia mas grande en vivo. intente sacar otra pero se escondio detras del edificio.
content.summary: Piñata like ufo... sphere like ufo with several cones.. decending at slow speed

content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: W

content.detailedDescription:
A researcher contacted me by phone and i refused to discuss the event i witnessed over the phone, i will talk to him by email only and answer any questions.  i want to remain private as much as possible.  i have my reasons.  the researcher can get my email address from this report

"this event was reported before" and i indicated the ufo as a "cloaking ufo", i analyzed my thoughts and believe it was not cloaking itself, but trying to find or open a portal or doorway of somekind to leave our planet.  it was having a problem in trying to open up the rip (that half of the other part of the ship was in) and finally after 12 to 15 seconds, the whole ship had disapeared and was gone in the fabric of our sky.  i believed the ship possessed the ability to create its own gravity and to use it to propel itself.  since the ship could remain stationary and was not losing altitude or anything.

                           "original description"

accept that i removed the wording about any cloaking.
   
while putting air into my car���s driver���s side back tire���, i stood straight up to rest my legs and ankles after using an air pressure gage to check my tire.  and as i looked unintentionally at the sky at a seventy-degree angle, i noticed half of this large object just hanging in the sky, just like a ���post-to note��� hanging on a bulletin board, between two big clouds and not moving.  the ufo was stationary between two clouds and i could only see half of it while the other half seemed to have disappeared or be invisible in the sky, like if you would cut half of a silver dollar in half and paste it to a bulletin board.  the half of the ufo i did see was medium lead gray in color and smooth all over with a bulge in the middle.  there were no windows, lights, or protruding fins or engines of any kind.  it made no sound; it just seemed to be just hanging there.  i then noticed that the half that i could see had like a fluid or wave of some kind (which was invisible) trying to cover the other half of the ship that was visible to me.  the edges of the fluid or wave sparkled as if it was trying to cover the remaining half of the flying saucer.  to me, the edges of the fluid or wave looked more like a rip in our sky than a fluid trying to cover the craft.  it looked like our sky was cut open, like if someone would cut open a hole into some type of material fabric on a bulletin board (our sky).  i know it sounds nuts but this is exactly what i witnessed!  the power and technology to do this must be extremely great like something out of science fiction.
content.summary: I looked unintentionally at the sky at a seventy-degree angle, noticing half of this large object hanging in the sky, just like a “post-to note.”

content.detailedDescription:
Vi un helicoptero pasar.. yo iba manejando con una compa���era.. cuando vi dos cosas rosas flotando en el aire, con forma de lombriz o gusano.. me estacione y tome unas fotos. me parecio extra���o que nadie mas aparentemente las viera estando a tan baja altura.

al estar observando, yo y mi compa���era, el ovni, paso un avion o jet a gran altura y a gran velocidad dejando un "camino" de nubes o un "chemtrail". el helicoptero que paso antes parece que solo vio el objeto un momento y despues se retiro.

llegando a mi destino note que uno de estos ovnis rosas se estaba moviendo hacia la misma direccion a donde se encontraban las otras (en chapultepec).
content.summary: Two worm live ufos next to a little orb observed near the "forest" of chapultepec

content.detailedDescription: 3 lights in total were traveling from south-west to north-east. one light seemed solid bright object in the middle and 2 others with three-light triangle on equal distance from the middle one. were not airplanes, helicopters etc.
content.summary: Unidentified flying objects have been seen over fayetteville nc

content.detailedDescription: This event occured after a short walk through our home locking doors, witness saw a light and took out a camera. the first craft was seen in the distance flying in a strange zig-zag pattern. this object was photographed, but at a low quality. the first witness and i discussed the object and thought it was strange as we had seen other objects in the area that resemble no known air craft and behaved in a strange halting then speeding up fashion, like pumping the brakes on a car. i said it was strange and thought nothing more until two minutes later the first witness ran back to me and told me to come to the window. that is when i saw a spot in the distance that was a purple,green,white,and orange strobe light. the object appeared to be going away from us but changed direction and came directly towards us. it seemed to know we were there watching. we had shut off all the lights to get a better view but it still seemed to know we were watching it. we watched the object come into view as a tadpole shaped craft with two antennae (one longer than the other) on the right side and a smaller one on the left side. the object came within 50 feet of us but it was moving at a rate of speed that no air craft i have ever seen. it was a metallic surface that was like the color of mercury and behaved in a strange fluid motion. it had four window like openings on the front that resembled the lenses of a fly. the craft flew over our garage and was in full view of our outside light, it seemed to come within inches of hitting the phone lines and light-pole. we were trying to take a photograph but our camera would not function properly, it had been used previously with no issues. our dog was acting very upset before the incident started, that is one of the reasons the first witness was up walking in front of the windows. i felt an almost metallic feeling in my body, partially out of fear but it was a strange feeling like i had a magnet inside of my body that was being pulled towards this thing. the other witness reported a similar but more intense feeling. she states that she was being drawn to look out the window. this object looked like a metallic tadpole with three spindly arms. after it almost hit our light it vansihed. it didn't go off into the distance it vanished without a trace. we pondered over it, thinking of all the explinations that we could. we would have been able to hear a plane or helecopter out of the windows but it was silent. this shook us up a bit and i have reported to you before and thought this was the most impressive thing i have ever seen. i hope this is detailed enough for you.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Car sized object seen in direct line of sight by two witnesses. unlike any known object. seen in area with numerous sightings.
